mapper.select:
select
from sps_custom_category where 1=1
and custom_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and custom_shop_num =#{customShopNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND custom_delete_flag = 0 order by cast(custom_wide as UNSIGNED INTEGER) asc , custom_create_time desc
